data.meanings: To prevent or hinder or hold back, to impede/withhold/arrest/restrain, to keep/debar/preclude/inhibit, to forbid/prohibit/interdict, deny or refuse, also to protect or defend or guard a thing, dispute or contest, resist or withstand, to strengthen or fortify, to make a thing inaccessible or unapproachable or difficult of access.
data.sentence: The word وَيَمْنَعُونَ comes from the root م ن ع and is associated with the meanings: To prevent or hinder or hold back, to impede/withhold/arrest/restrain, to keep/debar/preclude/inhibit, to forbid/prohibit/interdict, deny or refuse, also to protect or defend or guard a thing, dispute or contest, resist or withstand, to strengthen or fortify, to make a thing inaccessible or unapproachable or difficult of access.

data.meanings: charity, small kindness, neighbourly needs, succour
data.sentence: The word الْمَاعُونَ comes from the root م ع ن and is associated with the meanings: charity, small kindness, neighbourly needs, succour
